-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A relational data processor
--   
--   This is a relational data processor. Relational expressions are
--   written in Koshucode. Koshucode is a notation for both of descriptions
--   and calculations of data.
@package koshucode-baala-toolkit
@version 0.11.0.0

module Paths_koshucode_baala_toolkit
version :: Version
getBinDir :: IO FilePath
getLibDir :: IO FilePath
getDataDir :: IO FilePath
getLibexecDir :: IO FilePath
getDataFileName :: FilePath -> IO FilePath


-- | RDF-to-Koshucode conversion
module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.RDF

-- | Convert RDF graph to list of judges.
judgesFromRdf :: (RDF g, StringValue v) => RDFTupleType -> g -> [Judge v]

-- | Convert RDF triple to affirmed judge.
judgeFromTriple :: StringValue v => RDFTupleType -> Triple -> Judge v

-- | Type of conversion
data RDFTupleType

-- | Binary relation: <tt>/s</tt> subject and <tt>/o</tt> object.
RDFTuple2 :: RDFTupleType

-- | Ternary relation: <tt>/s</tt> subject, <tt>/p</tt> predicate, and
--   <tt>/o</tt> object.
RDFTuple3 :: RDFTupleType
instance Show RDFTupleType
instance Eq RDFTupleType
instance Ord RDFTupleType
instance Enum RDFTupleType
instance Bounded RDFTupleType

module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Exit
prelude :: IO (String, [String])

-- | Print message and exit on 0.
putSuccess :: String -> IO a

-- | Print error message and exit on 1.
putFailure :: String -> IO a
currentEncodings :: IO (String)

module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Version
versionString :: String


-- | RDF-to-Koshucode converter.
module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuRdfMain
koshuRdfMain :: IO ()
instance Show Option
instance Eq Option
instance Ord Option
instance Enum Option
instance Bounded Option


-- | Koshucode relational data processor.
module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuMain

-- | The main function for <tt>koshu</tt> command. See
--   <a>vanillaRelmaps</a> for default argument.
koshuMain :: Value v => [RelmapImplement v] -> IO ()
instance Show Option
instance Eq Option
instance Ord Option
instance Enum Option
instance Bounded Option
